name: pOngOut (ing73)
description:
I wrote this commodore 64 game for the Retro Programmers Inside (RPI) (https://www.facebook.com/groups/RetroProgrammersInside) Pongout challenge.

 I thought about doing a hybrid of pong and breakout. You can play with another player or with your computer, your c64. Destroy all the bricks to go to the next level.

 Hit the smileys to get the superball that doesn't bounce and smash where it passes!

Thanks to RPI and Phaze101 for support
